content: I am a Delhi based mathematician working as a Datascientist in NLP and OR areas. I have experience building Research teams and products based on Machine learning . Experienced with theoritical computer science , PAC learning ,SVMs and Statistics. Also a jazz guitarist who plays eight finger legato style . My latest interests are Algebraic Geometry and Philosophy of science .

title: Raghava Goteti
A novel approach for solving integer equal flow problems using algebraic geometry
On machine learning applications with algebraic geometry
